item.description:
***NOTE Location Change***

Visit Lisa and Dave's home in Cape Elizabeth to see what they have going on with their gardens, what some of their "wish list" items might be, and to brainstorm some permaculture ideas to help get there!

We'll gather between 6 and 6:30 to tour the property, followed by potluck and some discussion of what could be done! Wrap up around 8:30-ish.

All experience levels are welcome!

Potluck breakdown:
Last name starting with A-G bring salad or veg or dessert
Last name starting with H-M bring whatever you want
Last name starting with N-S bring bread or beverage
Last name starting with T-Z main or side dish to share

[we've been a little carb-heavy, so if you're at a loss, think protein or fresh veg or something...:)]

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Portland Maine Permaculture July Meetup
